flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In this project, we will use a transistor, LED(s), A battery and some wires to build a simple circuit that will flash an LED to the music!
guide.introduction_rendered: In this project, we will use a transistor, LED(s), A battery and some wires to build a simple circuit that will flash an LED to the music!
guide.summary: The SAMFWL is the Super Awesome Musical Flasher With LEDs. This easy to make circuit will flash LEDs to the playing music
guide.title: The SAMFWL
